name: Train Mail
description: A missile attack has been launched at an unsuspecting town. As a robotic mailbox, you must deliver a letter to warn the town's inhabitants before it's too late. Hijack locomotives to connect them to the train ahead of them and create a chain of trains to your destination. Robots will try to stop you, but you can dispatch of them quickly by bouncing off of them using your attack. Connect bounces together for maximum air time.
